Blog.post: Hi This is my first posting..........

Friday.........end of the week............AHA!!!!!! Long weekend............will be getting some much needed rest (ahem!!) Race weekend too.............Hope Ferrari can get back their brilliant form.........and win at Nurburgring!

Wednesday.............was raining since morning.........it was a pretty "gloomy" morning............... got a HUGE sub-sandwich from shoprite.........big enuf for lunch and dinner!:D:D have to pay bills today..........ohh how i hate this day..........comes every month................. its like someone giving u a chocolate and taking it away just as u were going to take the first bite.... I deposit my paycheck.........feel nice about the bank balance..........and just like that........ITS GONE!!! How nice wud it be if i didnt have to pay any bills!:D:D:D

Tuesday.........long time since my last posting...............got my H1 papers today...........FINALLY.............cant imagine how the postal service managed to misplace my originals......... anyways............shit happens!:D:D:D looking forward to the weekend already!:P:P

Wednesday..............been off the blog for the last 4 days................buffalo was great............great to meet everyone after so long..................... the graduation ceremony was awesome.............. the drive back from buffalo was even more fun..............running totally out of gas on an interstate at 1:15 at night............is a totally unforgettable experience!!!! slept for almost 13 hours monday night.............was totally exhausted............. its getting a little too hot and sunny outside for my comfort.........
Friday..............at last!!! No phone calls no panic emails..........nothing!!!! Will be in buffalo today.....................

Thursday.....the nightmare continues!!! Yesterday was the one of the most eventful days in my life at Netaps....................Nightmare at HMA - yeah..........new horror movie to hit NJ!!! Today has begun with promises to be very similar to yesterday................so hoping for the best!!!
Wednesday........nice day outside.........dont know much about what I need to do today!!! Really really looking forward to this weekend....................

Hmm.........tuesday..........slow morning today......nothing much to do................seems like things will start moving in the afternoon........... have to reserve a car for the weekend...........it really sucks to be under 25.....car rentals make u pay extra for being under 25............... Lets see if i can get a good deal from avis/enterprise................... have to book my tickets to india today............taking a gamble with Air India........:)

Monday.....start of a new week................ Am all alone in the office today.....have to hold fort till thursday.......... Just hope those people at HMA can get their act together........ am all excited about this weekend.......going to buffalo for my commencement............will have to wear the "zaga" and the "topi" and take the walk!!!! besides that, meeting all the junta in buffalo........its going to be a blast!!

Buying a suit..... What do u look for when u buy a suit? what style suits u best??? what material is the best??? how much will it cost??? so many questions.......no answers yet............I really need to find someone who can help me out with this.......dont want to end up buying something too cheap or too expensive......... Looked at some trekking photos last week,really miss trekking..........really miss being in Pune...........really miss going to the tekdi, really miss eating wada-pav, really miss my motorcycle, really miss my folks!!
Long time since my last post..........helping Dr. Foryes to get his sailboat into the water today........today is going to be fun!!:D:D:D Going to learn sailing from him, hope it works out!!!:D

Friday again!:D:D:D This week surely went by very very fast.............Have made up my mind to intensify my workouts........... Need to add some cardio workouts also........just situps and stuff will stop working after some time......... I dont believe in the "dieting" way of losing weight..........used to think it will be easier than exercising......but cant stay away from good food!:D:D realized that exercising is a better way......have lost a good 2 inches on the waist in the past 4 months..........so things are looking good! hope to lose some more by august!! lets see................

Living all by yourself, in a foreign land, with no close friends within a 40 mile radius can sound like a lot of pain!!! But I have realised that its not that bad after all.........of course, it would be great with people around, but nonetheless.......its not too bad......... I think my attitude to life has changed in the past few months.........I have never felt more independent, confident and eager for more, ever before........I have also learnt the value of friends and family........and how i always took them for granted...........I think I have learnt to live life.......not just go through each day............... Friday.........the end of the week.........AHA! planning to go to this huge outlet mall near NYC.......called Woodbury Commons...........it supposedly the "shopping attraction" for tourists on the east coast...........some 200 odd shops with all the brands u need.........GAP is a sure-shot destination..........Maybe the LEVIS store and the NIKE store.............I hope there is a SONY store too............. Till next time..............ADIOS AMHI GOES..............

Was reading the Gita online.......(english translation)............Krishna says that every man is given a set of tasks in his life....which he has to perform.........that is the only way to the "ultimate truth"............................. then, come to think of it.........Gautam Buddha left his wife and child in search of the "truth"......which means that he neglected his duties.............then how did he find the "eternal truth" and the "inner peace"??? is the "truth" different for buddhism and hinduism??? mebbe im not interpreting things correctly..........mebbe i need to just read between the lines some more............... Puzzling.......... Well...........i am kind of looking forward to the next "set of duties" for me to fulfill ;) ........but am started to get a little jittery too.................it might be the end of my LIFE that I CURRENTLY am living............ more later..........

Over the weekend, i had been to an outlet mall called the Woodbury Commons. It had the most amazing collection of designer brands that i have ever seen, and that too at a "reduced" price (which was anyways too high). BUT - why do MOST of the designer clothes for guys look so GAY????? Cant normal, straight guy-next-door guys wear clothes other than your routine jeans and tshirts, and NOT LOOK GAY?????? May be its the way im looking at those clothes.....but i think theres definitely room for improvement here............ till later........ciao
